episode: This Easter is making me more sentimental for my family

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: This Easter is making me more sentimental for my family

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It can be tough being away from loved ones during holidays.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it is. Plus I am getting older and the rest are getting older

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Time flies, and it's natural to feel a little nostalgic when thinking about the passing years.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is sad watching other get old

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's hard to see the people you care about age.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Especially my parents. I know we only have a limited time to celebrate with them

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a tough reality to face. Make the most of the time you have with them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is what I am doing taking more time with time

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful! Cherish every moment with them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Plus all of my nephew are adults know. I missed when they were kids

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those childhood years go by so fast, don't they?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I know, but one nephew is bring his new baby that was born back in December

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A new baby in the family! That's something to be excited about!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is. Holidays are more fun with kids around

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Kids bring so much energy and joy to the holidays!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes. I am really going to enjoy Easter this year

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm glad to hear that! You deserve it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, have a great Easter!
